Privacy Policy

Last Updated: December 2025

1. Client-Side Processing

The Global Tax Calculator is a static, client-side application. All calculations regarding your income, expenses, and tax liabilities are performed locally within your browser using JavaScript.

2. No Financial Data Storage

We do not store, transmit, or process your personal financial data on any server. Once you close this browser tab, all input data is permanently cleared from your session. We do not have access to your income details or tax breakdown.

3. Cookies and Tracking

We use minimal cookies primarily for user experience management, such as remembering your preferred Dark Mode setting or selected country. These are stored locally on your device via localStorage.

4. Google AdSense Transparency

Third-party vendors, including Google, use cookies to serve ads based on a user's prior visits to this website or other websites. Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads to users based on their visit to your sites and/or other sites on the Internet.

Users may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Ads Settings.

5. Contact Us

If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy, you may contact us via our official repository or support channels.
